strong.span: Bedford County Schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year. SACP will be closed during this time.
For important information regarding the rescheduling of Bedford County Schools Graduation ceremonies, please click here.

span.style: font-size: 16px; font-family: arial black, avant garde;
font-size: 16px; font-family: arial black, avant garde;

p.span: Our team has been busy working to make our “BCS at Home Learning” resources available to students on Wednesday, April 8, 2020. As we have shared previously, participation is voluntary and completion will not affect a student’s grade. We encourage our students to take advantage of these resources, which are designed to help them stay engaged in learning and reinforce previous instruction. These resources are available HERE.

span.style: font-family: arial black, avant garde; font-size: 16px;

a.title: Extended Closure Guidance
a.span: Please click here for information about Bedford County School Programs available during our extended closure.

a.title: Educational Materials
a.span: Please click here for instructional packets for your student's continued learning throughout this extended closure.

strong.span: April 21, 2020 - Board of Education Regular Monthly Meeting @ 5:30 P.M. in the central office building board room. Click HERE to view the agenda.

p.style: font:10px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align:center; color:#222

div.p:
Bedford County Schools offers educational and employment opportunities without regard to race, color, national origin, religion, sex, creed, age, or disability.
Bedford County Schools is not responsible for questionable or controversial content found through links external to this site.
